title: Gene Expression Laboratory
description: Heterologous gene expression of a recombinant protein in a microbial system: gene cloning, construction of expression plasmid, DNA sequence analysis, transformation of microbial host, selection and analysis of transformed host cells, expression and purification of recombinant protein. 2 laboratories. Crosslisted as BIO/CHEMÂ 476.
prerequisites: BIO/CHEM 475; CHEM 313 or CHEM 371, or graduate standing in Biological Sciences
